title: shirer the rise of the iii reich
description:
The rise of the third Reich (Simon Schuster NYC, 1141 pages)


Mister Shirer DID live in Germany during the first years of the nazi system as an

american journalist. His book was published in 1960 and is a NEED for all those 

interested in this historic time.



















A personal note: i find of particular interest the description of the events

                 during the spring and summer of 1939 , the concrete steps leading 

                 to the crucial sÃƒÂ©jour of Ribbentrop in the Kremlin and the stupid

                 attitude of Britain , not avoiding this immensely lethal day.
